api.body:
require "pixcHelper"
require "pixcIoCore"
if self.ioCore ~= nil then
	return 
end
if self.helper == nil then
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end
self.ioCore = createIoCore()
pixc.log(self.helper)
pixc.log(self.ioCore)
self.ioCore:setStatusCallbacks(
	function (...) pixc.log(...) end,
	function(isOpen) self().IsOpen(isOpen, true) end)
	
self.open = false
self.ip = self.helper:getProperty("IP","127.0.0.1")
self.ipLocal = pixc.getRoot().Utils.Network.convertLocalAdapterEntry(self.helper:getProperty("Adapter IP","Any"))
self.dmxMode = self.helper:getProperty("DMX Mode","None")
self.dmxPropIn = self.helper:getProperty("DedicatedDmxProperties Input","")
self.dmxPropOut = self.helper:getProperty("DedicatedDmxProperties Output","")
self.enableSerial = self.helper:getProperty("Enable Serial","")
self.serialBaud = self.helper:getProperty("Serial Baudrate","")
self.serialParity = self.helper:getProperty("Serial Parity","")
self.serialStopbits = self.helper:getProperty("Serial Stopbits","")
self.serialDataBits = self.helper:getProperty("Serial Databits","")
self.serialCallback = function (data) self().Serial.read(data) end
self.serialCallbackHandle = nil
self.serialCallFunctionName = "addInputData"
self.IsOpen(false, true)
self.IsConnected(false, true)
self.ioCore:configure(
	self.ip,
	self.ipLocal,
	function(c1,i1,c2,i2,c3,i3,c4,i4,c5,i5,c6,i6,c7,i7,c8,i8)
		if c1 then self.Gpi.Gpi1(i1,true);end
		if c2 then self.Gpi.Gpi2(i2,true);end
		if c3 then self.Gpi.Gpi3(i3,true);end
		if c4 then self.Gpi.Gpi4(i4,true);end
		if c5 then self.Gpi.Gpi5(i5,true);end
		if c6 then self.Gpi.Gpi6(i6,true);end
		if c7 then self.Gpi.Gpi7(i7,true);end
		if c8 then self.Gpi.Gpi8(i8,true);end
	end,
	function(c1,o1,c2,o2,c3,o3,c4,o4,c5,o5,c6,o6,c7,o7,c8,o8)
		if c1 then self.gpo1 =  o1; self.Gpo.setGpo1();end
		if c2 then self.gpo2 =  o2; self.Gpo.setGpo2();end
		if c3 then self.gpo3 =  o3; self.Gpo.setGpo3();end
		if c4 then self.gpo4 =  o4; self.Gpo.setGpo4();end
		if c5 then self.gpo5 =  o5; self.Gpo.setGpo5();end
		if c6 then self.gpo6 =  o6; self.Gpo.setGpo6();end
		if c7 then self.gpo7 =  o7; self.Gpo.setGpo7();end
		if c8 then self.gpo8 =  o8; self.Gpo.setGpo8();end
	end,
	function(err,state)
		if err~= nil then 
			self.IsConnected(false,true);
		else
			self.IsConnected(state,true);
		end
	end,
	self.dmxMode,
	function (dmxInData) 
		self.DMX.Helper.inputHandler(dmxInData)
	end,
	self.enableSerial,
	self.serialBaud,
	self.serialParity,
	self.serialStopbits,
	self.serialDataBits,
	self.serialCallback,
	self.serialCallbackHandle,
	self.serialCallFunctionName
	)

self.ioCore:setStatusCallbacks(
	function (...) pixc.log(...) end,
	function(isOpen) self().IsOpen(isOpen, true) end)
	

self.ioCore:start()
api.name: init

api.body:
self.IsConnected(false,true);
if self.ioCore == nil then return end
self.ioCore:close()
self.ioCore = nil
self.helper = nil
api.name: uninit

api.body:
if self.helper == nil then
	require "pixcHelper"
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end
self.dmxMode = self.helper:getProperty("DMX Mode","None")
self.dmxPropIn = self.helper:getProperty("DedicatedDmxProperties Input","")
self.dmxPropOut = self.helper:getProperty("DedicatedDmxProperties Output","")

if self.dmxMode == "In" or self.dmxMode == "In slow" then
	self.dmxDSC = self.dmxPropIn;
	self.dmxDirOut = false;
elseif self.dmxMode == "Out" or self.dmxMode == "Out slow" then
	self.dmxDSC = self.dmxPropOut;
	self.dmxDirOut = true;
end
if self.ioCore ~= nil then 
    self.ioCore:close()
    self.IsOpen(false, true)
    self.IsConnected(false, true)
end

self().dynamicRebuildFromDescriptions(self.DMX.Helper.getDescription(), "DMX", "(.*)")
api.name: refreshDedicatedDmxProperties

if self.ioCore ~= nil then
		self.ioCore:toggleGpo(1);
		self.gpo1 =   not self.gpo1; self.Gpo.setGpo1()	
	end

--
if type(data)=='table' then  
	self.ioCore:writeDmxOut(data,startIndex-1)
elseif type(data) == 'number' then
	tbl = {}
	tbl[1] = data
	self.ioCore:writeDmxOut(tbl,startIndex-1)
else
end
elems.name: write
getDescription

elems.body:
--
if data ~= nil then
	for i=1, 512, 1 do 
		if data[i] ~= nil then
			local tag = "DMX"..math.tointeger(i);
			if self.DMX[tag] ~=nil then
				self.DMX[tag](data[i],true)
			end
		end
	end
end
elems.name: inputHandler

elems.body: if val == nil then doSet = false; end ; self.dmxOut1 = pixcCommon.execAttribute(0, self.dmxOut1, val, doSet);if self.ioCore ~= nil then   self.DMX.Helper.write(val,1) ; end;return self.dmxOut1
